execution_quality: Methodical and thorough - the agent systematically searched for TMUX variable usage patterns and read relevant configuration files to understand the technical landscape, though it didn't complete the final requested task of web search and project initialization.
work_category: Exploratory research and codebase analysis to understand an existing concept before implementation planning. The agent investigated how tmux detection works and how the TMUX variable functions to evaluate feasibility of the user's creative idea.
summary: The agent performed solid exploratory work investigating the technical feasibility of the user's tmux-emulation idea through codebase analysis, but did not execute the user's explicit follow-up request to search the web and create a new project directory. The work was focused and on-track, but the task is incomplete as stated.
follow_up_pattern: User expects web search to be performed and a new project directory created at ~/projects/emux. The follow-up request indicates the user wants to move from exploration to implementation planning.
